name: Splatoon™
description: Splatter enemies and claim your turf as ink-spraying, squid-like Inklings in Nintendo's ultimate messfest! Compete online in chaotic four-on-four turf wars, and unleash squid powers to ink your way to victory. Rank up in online battles to unlock new weapons and fresh gear for your Inkling, complete with unique gameplay perks! May the best mess win. Fresh content: New modes, maps, gear, and more are rolling out regularly throughout summer 2015, so there’s always something new to try out! Team matchmaking and more: Team up with friends and hone your strategy together in online team modes. Create your own squid squad of up to four friends in Squad Battle, or choose your own map and rules, and play with up to seven of your friends in Private Battle. Or go solo and get matched with other players around the world in 4 vs. 4 battles that let you level up or boost your rank. However you play, there's no time to blink—prepare to ink! Check out the theme inspired by this game in the Nintendo 3DS Theme Shop*. Just tap the icon in the upper left corner of your Nintendo 3DS* HOME Menu to get started. *Theme compatible on Nintendo 3DS family of systems. Systems and themes sold separately.
